snippet.title: Madden 25 | Franchise and Presentation Deep Dive
snippet.description:
Nothing hits like Boom Tech in #Madden25. Available 8.16.24. Pre-Order: http://x.ea.com/80932

We're excited to take you on a Deep Dive of all of the new features and updates coming to Franchise Mode. Our developers can’t wait to tell you about some of the new features including Team Builder, Franchise Central, the NFL Draft Night experience and more.
Introducing the MVP Bundle, including EA SPORTS College Football 25, Madden 25, and bonus rewards to help you make game day every day.  

Subscribe and follow all the Madden 25 social channels 👉https://linktr.ee/eamaddennfl

CHAPTERS:
0:00 - Intro
0:30 - NFL Draft 
2:06 - Team Builder
2:30 - Franchise Updates
3:20 - New Presentation 

ESRB: Rating Pending

This game includes optional in-game purchases of virtual currency that can be used to acquire virtual in-game items, including a random selection of virtual in-game items.
